item.title: Elements
item.dc:creator: Theme Admin
item.description: The purpose of this HTML is to help determine what default settings are with CSS and to make sure that all possible HTML Elements are included in this HTML so as to not miss any possible Elements when designing a site. item.content:encoded:
The purpose of this HTML is to help determine what default settings are with CSS and to make sure that all possible HTML Elements are included in this HTML so as to not miss any possible Elements when designing a site.

item.title: More Tags
item.dc:creator: Theme Admin
item.description: More of these posts need tags.

item.title: HTML
item.dc:creator: Theme Admin
item.description: What HTML tags would you like to see? Let’s start with an unordered list: One Two Three Four And then move on to a more interesting ordered list: one, two buckle my shoe three, four knock at the door Five, six pick up sticks Seven, eight, lay them straight Nine, ten, a big fat hen… Continue Reading HTML
item.content:encoded:
What HTML tags would you like to see?

Let’s start with an unordered list:

  • One
  • Two
  • Three
  • Four

And then move on to a more interesting ordered list:

  1. one, two
    1. buckle my shoe
  2. three, four
    1. knock at the door
  3. Five, six
    1. pick up sticks
  4. Seven, eight, lay them straight
    1. Nine, ten, a big fat hen
    2. Eleven, twelve, dig and delve
    3. Thirteen, fourteen, maids a’courting
    4. Fifteen, sixteen, maids in the kitchen
    5. Seventeen, eighteen, maids a’waiting
    6. Nineteen, twenty, my platter’s empty …

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I never could remember more than the first few lines of that nursery rhyme.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: Theme Admin
item.description: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Need a comment with a real Gravatar.
